mapper.select:
select t.province_no, t.province, t.region_no, t.name from ( select p.province_no, p.province, null region_no, null name from province p where p.province like '%'||#{value}||'%'
union
select p.province_no, p.province, r.region_no, r.name from province p, region r where p.province_no = r.province_no and r.name like '%'||#{value}||'%' ) t order by province_no asc, region_no asc nulls first
select category_no, category_name, category_enrolled_date from category
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_GROUP_NO.nextval from dual
insert into groups values ( #{group_no}, #{province_no}, #{region_no}, #{category_no}, #{group_name}, #{group_url}, #{content}, sysdate )
insert into GImage values ( SEQ_GROUP_IMAGE_NO.nextval, #{group_no}, #{image_name}, sysdate, #{mainImg} )
mapper.select: select rt.rn, rt.group_no, rt.province_no, rt.province, rt.region_no, rt.name, rt.category_no, rt.category_name, rt.group_name, rt.group_url, rt.content, rt.founded_date, rt.member_cnt from(select rownum rn, ot.group_no, ot.province_no, ot.province, ot.region_no, ot.name, ot.category_no, ot.category_name, ot.group_name, ot.group_url, ot.content, ot.founded_date, ot.member_cnt from (select gtbl.group_no, gtbl.province_no, gtbl.province, gtbl.region_no, gtbl.name, gtbl.category_no, gtbl.category_name, gtbl.group_name, gtbl.group_url, gtbl.group_content content, gtbl.founded_date, NVL(ctbl.member_cnt, 0) member_cnt from(select gs.group_no, gs.province_no, pv.province, gs.region_no, rg.name, gs.category_no, ct.category_name, gs.group_name, gs.group_url, gs.group_content, gs.founded_date from groups gs, province pv, region rg, category ct where gs.province_no = pv.province_no and gs.region_no = rg.region_no and gs.category_no = ct.category_no) gtbl , (select group_no, count(*) member_cnt from groupmember group by group_no) ctbl where gtbl.group_no = ctbl.group_no(+) order by member_cnt desc ) ot ) rt where rt.rn >=1 and rt.rn <=2

select rt.rn, rt.group_no, rt.province_no, rt.province, rt.region_no, rt.name, rt.category_no, rt.category_name, rt.group_name, rt.group_url, rt.content, rt.founded_date, rt.member_cnt from(select rownum rn, ot.group_no, ot.province_no, ot.province, ot.region_no, ot.name, ot.category_no, ot.category_name, ot.group_name, ot.group_url, ot.content, ot.founded_date, ot.member_cnt from (select gtbl.group_no, gtbl.province_no, gtbl.province, gtbl.region_no, gtbl.name, gtbl.category_no, gtbl.category_name, gtbl.group_name, gtbl.group_url, gtbl.group_content content, gtbl.founded_date, NVL(ctbl.member_cnt, 0) member_cnt from(select gs.group_no, gs.province_no, pv.province, gs.region_no, rg.name, gs.category_no, ct.category_name, gs.group_name, gs.group_url, gs.group_content, gs.founded_date from groups gs, province pv, region rg, category ct where gs.province_no = pv.province_no and gs.region_no = rg.region_no and gs.category_no = ct.category_no) gtbl , (select group_no, count(*) member_cnt from groupmember group by group_no) ctbl where gtbl.group_no = ctbl.group_no(+) order by gtbl.founded_date desc ) ot ) rt where rt.rn >=1 and rt.rn <=2
select group_image_no, group_no, image_name, uploaded_time, mainImg from gImage where group_no = #{group_no} order by uploaded_time asc
select group_image_no, group_no, image_name, uploaded_time, mainImg from gImage where group_no = #{group_no} and mainImg = 'main'
